metadata.title: CVE-2016-4171 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player 21.0.0.242 and earlierallows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors, asexploited in the wild in June 2016.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4171` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.626ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.626ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.626ubuntu0.14.04.1').
